verses.verse: Beloved, <S%G27><s%> I <S%G2172>wish<s%> <S%G4012>above<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> that <S%G4571>thou<s%> mayest <S%G2137>prosper<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be in <S%G5198>health,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2137>prospereth.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> <S%G3029>greatly,<s%> when the <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3140>testified<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> that is in <S%G4675>thee,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G4043>walkest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> have borne <S%G3140>witness<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G26>charity<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G1577>church:<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> if thou bring forward on their <S%G4311>journey<s%> after a godly <S%G516>sort,<s%> <S%G2316><s%> thou shalt <S%G4160>do<s%> well: <S%G2573><s%>

Because <S%G1063><s%> that for his name's <S%G5228>sake<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3686><s%> they went <S%G1831>forth,<s%> <S%G2983>taking<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

We <S%G2249><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G618>receive<s%> <S%G5108>such,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we might <S%G1096>be<s%> fellow <S%G4904>helpers<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth.<s%>

I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1361>Diotrephes,<s%> who loveth to have the <S%G5383>preeminence<s%> among <S%G848>them,<s%> <S%G1926>receiveth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G3756>not.<s%>

Wherefore, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> I will <S%G5279>remember<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4160>doth,<s%> prating <S%G5396>against<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> with <S%G4190>malicious<s%> <S%G3056>words:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G714>content<s%> <S%G1909>therewith,<s%> <S%G5125><s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> doth <S%G848>he<s%> himself <S%G1926>receive<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2967>forbiddeth<s%> them that <S%G1014>would,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1544>casteth<s%> them out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church.<s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> <S%G3401>follow<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> that which is <S%G2556>evil,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> that which is <S%G18>good.<s%> He that doeth <S%G15>good<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he that doeth <S%G2554>evil<s%> hath <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Demetrius <S%G1216><s%> hath good <S%G3140>report<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G846>itself:<s%> <S%G1161>yea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> also bear <S%G3140>record;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3141>record<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true.<s%>

I <S%G2192>had<s%> many <S%G4183>things<s%> to <S%G1125>write,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G3188>ink<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2563>pen<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%> unto thee: <S%G4671><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1679>trust<s%> I shall <S%G2112>shortly<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> we shall <S%G2980>speak<s%> face to <S%G4750>face.<s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G4750><s%> <S%G1515>Peace<s%> be to <S%G4671>thee.<s%> Our <S%G5384>friends<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G4571>thee.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5384>friends<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3686>name.<s%>
